description: Erection of a 4 and 6 storey rooftop extension (38 apartments), change of use of Floors 2 and 8 from office to residential use (20 apartments) along with a part change of use of ground floor to form two cafe/restaurant (Class A3) units, a part first floor communal co-working space, ground floor front extension and 2 storey rear extension, alterations to elevations, along with public realm improvements, associated parking and ground floor A3 use and residential entrance lobby.
